title: Live updates: Israel strikes Hezbollah in Lebanon as Iran conflict spreads across region
summary_full: Three U.S. service members have been killed, and President Donald Trump said “there will likely be more” with U.S.-Israeli operations set to continue for weeks.
summary_public: Three U.S. service members have been killed, and President Donald Trump said “there will likely be more” with U.S.-Israeli operations set to continue for weeks.
